== Library ==
[[File:Village Library Old Isometric Render (Programmer Art).png|thumb|Library 1 (Plains, Old)]]
The [[oak]] in these [[Village/Structure/Blueprints|blueprints]] can be replaced with [[spruce]] or [[acacia]] [[wood]] if the village is in the [[taiga]] or [[savanna]], respectively. For this reason, they are considered the same thing.

Note: the wood stairs are ''optional'' for the first layer and generates only if the library was spawned above street level. The first layer is 9 blocks by 6 blocks. 
The wooden pressure plate is replaced with a brown carpet {{in|be}}.
